column4: hey guys, i can't install karmic because it won't recognize my hard drives. because a livecd requires a reboot, i can't boot livecd, run an update and then try to install with fixes (since a reboot clears it ofc)
is it possible to install ubuntu to a new partition from windows? i might be able to run an update first
if you have an ubuntu live cd it will give you that kind of option
